divs: sighting detailsi was driving from seabrook nh to hampton on the coast at 9:30 after getting pizza with a friend when something in the sky caught my eye. i pulled over and observed until it disappeared. i saw a larger than star orange\red glow slowly move across the sky directly over seabrook nuclear power plant and few minutes before it disappeared a ring like saturn's appeared around it. it did not disappear in cloud but when straight up in the air till it disappeared in the abyss.
Summary: Orange/red glowing sphere with Saturn like ring around it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Seabrook
There were no other sightings in Seabrook on or around May 7th 2010
